name: Rammus
title: the Armordillo
lore: Idolized by many, dismissed by some, mystifying to all, the curious being Rammus is an enigma. Protected by a spiked shell, he inspires increasingly disparate theories on his origin wherever he goes—from demigod, to sacred oracle, to a mere beast transformed by magic. Whatever the truth may be, Rammus keeps his own counsel and stops for no one as he roams the Shuriman desert.
blurb: Idolized by many, dismissed by some, mystifying to all, the curious being Rammus is an enigma. Protected by a spiked shell, he inspires increasingly disparate theories on his origin wherever he goes—from demigod, to sacred oracle, to a mere beast...
allytips: Powerball can be used as an effective escape mechanism.
Using taunt on a champion by your tower can cause the tower to attack your enemy.
Tremors and Defensive Ball Curl can be used late in the game to obliterate towers. If you're bogged down in a team fight, it is often valuable to break off and attack the buildings.
enemytips: Pay particular attention to when his Defensive Ball Curl is off. Rammus has much lower stats than a normal tank when he's out of the stance.
Rammus often stacks high Armor, leaving him especially vulnerable to caster damage while not in Defensive Ball Curl.

riot_spell_q.name: Powerball
riot_spell_q.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Rammus accelerates in a ball, gaining up to {{ f2 }}% Movement Speed over {{ e4 }} seconds. On enemy collision, he stops, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back, and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Powerball on cooldown.
Powerball is a channeled spell and is subject to interruption by spells that prevent casting.
Casting Powerball cancels Defensive Ball Curl and puts it on cooldown.

riot_spell_w.name: Defensive Ball Curl
riot_spell_w.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Rammus enters a defensive formation for up to {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing Armor by {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% ({{ f1 }}) and Magic Resist by {{ e8 }} plus {{ e7 }}% ({{ f2 }}) but becoming slowed by {{ e5 }}%.

During this time, Spiked Shell deals {{ e4 }}% damage and also deals its damage to enemies that basic attack Rammus.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Defensive Ball Curl on cooldown.
Casting Defensive Ball Curl cancels Powerball and puts it on cooldown.

riot_spell_e.name: Frenzying Taunt
riot_spell_e.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Taunt an enemy champion or monster for {{ e1 }} seconds and gain {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for the same duration.

While any of Rammus' other spells are active, Frenzying Taunt's Attack Speed bonus is refreshed.

riot_spell_r.name: Tremors
riot_spell_r.description: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Shake the earth for {{ duration }} seconds, dealing {{ damagecalc }} magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by {{ slowperstack*100 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds, stacking up to {{ numberofpulses }} times.

Tremors deals {{ turretdamagemodifier*100 }}% damage to turrets.

riot_spell_i.name: Spiked Shell
riot_spell_i.description: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Spiked Shell
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Basic attacks deal {{pp|13|8 to 20|formula=7+level. ''Capped at level 13''|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 10% armor)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}, increased by 50% to {{pp|13|8*1.5 to 20*1.5|formula=10.5+1.5*level. ''Capped at level 13''|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 15% armor)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} while {{ai|Defensive Ball Curl|Rammus}} is active.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Powerball
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rammus''' tucks into a ball and begins to roll, {{ct|channel|channeling|attack=false|move=true|cast=Q and W interrupt. E is disabled. R is usable|items=interrupts,true,,false|spells=true,true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts}} for up to 6 seconds, gaining {{pp|key=%|150/6 to 235/6|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} per second over the duration, up to a maximum of {{pp|key=%|150 to 235|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: '''Rammus''' stops rolling upon colliding with an enemy, {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} all nearby enemies 100 units over {{tt|{{fd|0.75}} seconds|Estimated}}, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 1 second.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* ''Powerball'' will still hit nearby enemies (including minions) if ''Rammus'' is {{tip|ghosted}}.
* ''Powerball'' will trigger {{nie|Mana Charge}} twice (upon activation and when ending it prematurely).

wikia_skill_w1.name: Defensive Ball Curl
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rammus''' drops into a defensive stance for 6 seconds, gaining {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}, increasing {{ais|Spiked Shell|Rammus}} damage by 50%, and applying it to enemies whenever they use basic attacks against him. '''Rammus''' is {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 30% for the duration.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling:
{{st|Bonus Armor|30 {{as|(+ {{ap|60 to 100}}% '''total''' armor)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Magic Resistance|10 {{as|(+ {{ap|30 to 50}}% '''total''' magic resistance)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description2: ''Defensive Ball Curl'' can be canceled instantly by reactivating the ability or by activating {{ai|Powerball|Rammus}}.
wikia_skill_w1.notes: * ''Defensive Ball Curl'' will return damage from attacks and/or abilities that apply [[on-hit effect]]s ({{ai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}}) as well as from {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}} (will not return damage from [[turret]]s, {{ai|H-28G Evolution Turret|Heimerdinger}}, or {{ai|Jack in the Box|Shaco}}).

wikia_skill_e1.name: Frenzying Taunt
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rammus''' {{tip|taunt|taunts}} the target enemy, gaining {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for the duration.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: While {{ai|Powerball|Rammus}}, {{ai|Defensive Ball Curl|Rammus}} or {{ai|Tremors|Rammus}} is active, the {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} is refreshed.
wikia_skill_e1.notes: * ''Frenzying Taunt'' behaves like a {{tip|stun}} when cast right before ''Rammus'' enters {{tip|stasis}}.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Tremors
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rammus''' creates an earthquake around himself for 8 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} and dealing {{as|magic damage}} each second to nearby enemies for the duration. Structures receive double damage.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|40 to 120}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|40*8 to 120*8}} {{as|(+ 160% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Structure Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|40*2 to 120*2}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Structure Total Magic Damage|{{ap|40*2*8 to 120*2*8}} {{as|(+ 320% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.description2: The {{tip|slow}} persists for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and stacks up to 8 times.
wikia_skill_r1.notes: * ''Tremors'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Rammus' ''previous orders.
